thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Consolidated Communications Q4 Adjusted Loss Per Share $0.04

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Consolidated Communications Q4 Adjusted Loss Per Share $0.04
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Consolidated Communications Holdings Inc :
* CONSOLIDATED COMMUNICATIONS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.44 * IN QUARTER, RECOGNIZED $115.1 MILLION NET TAX BENEFIT, LARGELY ASSOCIATED WITH RECENT TAX REFORM LEGISLATION
* SEES FISCAL 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURE OF $235 MILLION TO $245 MILLION
* SEES FISCAL 2018 CASH INTEREST EXPENSE $123 MILLION TO $128 MILLION
* QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $ 356.4 MILLION VERSUS $175.9 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.00, REVENUE VIEW $356.7 MILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
